description: Renu Kumari Yadav (born 16 January 1959) is an Indian-born Nepali politician and member of the House of Representatives. She has served in multiple ministerial roles, including as Minister for Physical Infrastructure and Transportation, Minister for Education, and Minister for Women, Children and Social Affairs. Throughout her career, she has been affiliated with various political parties and is currently the Joint chairman of the People's Socialist Party.
short_description: Indian-born Nepali politician, who is the Joint chairman of the People's Socialist Party and a former government minister.
tags: Member of House of Representatives Nepal
